1.text: Bring your arms out in front of you one at a time.

2.text: Turn your palms upward one at a time.

3.text: Place your right hand on your left shoulder.

4.text: Place your left hand on your right shoulder.

5.text: Put your hands on the back of your head one at a time.

6.text: Bring your hands down to your hips one at a time.

7.text: Move your hands to the opposite hip one at a time.

8.text: Move your hips around in a circle 3 times.

9.text: Jump and turn your body 90 degrees to the left.

10.text: Clap your hands and repeat the sequence.

12.text: Start moving your hips side to side.

13.text: Start dancing when the lyrics in the song start.

14.text: Remember to turn 90 degrees after each step sequence.

15.text: Keep dancing until the song is over.
